title: Major FPS and Input lag problems
body:
Hi guys,

I played a game yesterday, with no problems, everything was running smooth. Today however, my game would not get over 60 fps and would stay at around 20-30 for the majority of the game. I usually play on 400+ fps, so fps this low is uplayable for me. Also, i noticed a massive input lag problem occuring, it looked almost like turn rate in dota. My ping stays at 30, I am using a 300mbs ethernet

replies.body: Since this difference just started happening, it might be caused by a possibly outdated driver since your ping is still pretty steady. Let's be sure to go through the steps in our [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to cover all our bases just in case.
